Hi!We are doing web crawling using Heritrix, and found one issue in that on=
ce a link has been 'discovered,' it won't be 'rediscovered.'  This means th=
at if we have something like:
 aol.com->aolhealth.com
 aolhealth.com->drugc=
hecker.aolhealth.com

and if drugchecker.aolhealth.com links to aol.com, th=
at link will not show up in the file.

Is there any way to fix this problem=
? Thanks!
